Name: nordvpn
Overview: Official NordVPN client in a docker container; it makes routing traffic through the NordVPN network easy.SpaceInvaders One video-guide on how to route other dockers via another: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=znSu_FuKFW0

@attributes.Name: Location
@attributes.Description: [country]/[server]/[country_code]/[city]/[group] or [country] [city], if none provide you will connect to the recommended server.

@attributes.Name: DNS
@attributes.Description: Can set up to 3 DNS servers. For example 1.1.1.1,8.8.8.8 or Disable, Setting DNS disables CyberSec.

@attributes.Name: Technology
@attributes.Description: Specify Technology to use. NordLynx faster (but experimental).

@attributes.Name: CyberSEC
@attributes.Description: When enabled, the CyberSec feature will automatically block suspicious websites so that no malware or other cyber threats can infect your device.

@attributes.Name: LAN net
@attributes.Description: CIDR networks (IE 192.168.1.0/24), add a route to allows replies once the VPN is up.
